title: Side Story - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Caring Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Unrequited Love   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Pendley   펜들리
description:
Ver Grant, a man who watched the woman he liked from afar.

However, the man’s love was not reciprocated.

Ver, who had always stayed beside Cecia, the heroine, and was the first to step forward when it came to her, was never present during the crucial moments.

He only existed for the protagonist at the moment for the male lead to shine.

Arim swept through the sentences on paper as if comforting Ver. She hoped he would be happy with his beloved, though she knew it would not come true.

When she opened her eyes from the end of her last memory, she had become Prillance, the villainess in the novel ’The Duke’s Lover’.

The story of a man and a woman whose lives are of a supporting character’s.>
